id="Me0ZDu4toXSEd_hLPdI3-2" value="Give me the order&nbsp;for this user. <br>Here's the Access Token" y="190" width="200" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Me0ZDu4toXSEd_hLPdI3-3" value="GET /orders<br>Authorization: Bearer &lt;token&gt;" x="730" y="300" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1_yhim7whZ614-bNuj_B-53" value="Validate the<br>token signature"
